summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities, declaring as surplus certain real property interests, authorizing the correction of certain easements previously authorized by Ordinance 121294 and Ordinance 116502 to Puget Sound Energy, Inc. to adhere to the as- built legal descriptions of certain electrical and fiber optic communication facilities, and access thereto, and to correct other errors in the legal descriptions, all on a portion of City property known as the Lake Youngs Reservation.
